## KEYBOARD\_HANDLER\_OPTIONS variable

Token for injecting options for keyboard handler plugin

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
KEYBOARD_HANDLER_OPTIONS: InjectionToken<KeyboardHandlerOptions>
```
